title: Three-Alarm Fire (1949 Film-Noir) Directed by William Berke

sources.title: Three-Alarm Fire (1949 Film-Noir) Directed by William Berke
sources.description:
Firefighter Joe Martin, assigned to the Arson Squad, suspects a string of fires at a furrier's warehouse and home may be part of an insurance fraud scheme. Posing as a disgraced fireman, Joe goes undercover to infiltrate a ring led by crooked insurance agent & store owner. While his romance with Jane blossoms, Joe faces deadly traps and violent confrontations & they find themselves in over their heads.

(original title) Arson, Inc. 
Colorized version: https://youtu.be/LwWRx6U2Qvo


Director: William Berke
Music: Raoul Kraushaar
Writers: Arthur Caesar, Maurice Tombragel
Stars: Robert Lowery, Anne Gwynne, Edward Brophy
Genres: Action, Crime, Drama, Film-Noir, Romance


@CultCinemaClassics 

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZ0h0ouY9tWI-vfLlRO1Nt2
